name: Razorburn
description:
Razorburn is a specially designed weapon by the android DX801-Y race's elite royal guard. What makes this weapon so unique is it's ability to infuse standard physical rounds with an explosive compound within the chamber at the push of a button making explosive rounds when the situation calls for it. 

It's capabilities, accuracy and lightweight make the weapon an engineering marvel that other races have not been able to reverse engineer. 

Braze obtained the weapon as prize for saving the supreme chancellors daughter from an assassination attempt and always likes to keep it in his arsenal.

Attack: +15
Speed: +10
